snippet: After Atlanta's offense exploded on them two nights earlier, the Toronto Raptors faced a similar situation in the first quarter Sunday night — they were leaving Orlando players open, and the inferior Magic were knocking down shots....
lead_paragraph: After Atlanta's offense exploded on them two nights earlier, the Toronto Raptors faced a similar situation in the first quarter Sunday night — they were leaving Orlando players open, and the inferior Magic were knocking down shots.

headline.main: DeRozan, Raptors Rout Magic Behind Big Third Quarter
headline.print_headline: DeRozan, Raptors Rout Magic Behind Big Third Quarter
